def plotAvgSalary(df, cat):
    a = df.groupby([cat])['Salary_avg'].mean()
    a = a.reset_index()
    a = a.sort_values('Salary_avg', ascending=False)
    a = a.reset_index(drop=True)
    fig = px.bar(a, x=cat, y='Salary_avg')
    fig.show()
